report.title: Results overview - ecological output
report.description: A report to display the ecological guild details on the Results Overview page.
report.query: select #columns# from cache_occurrences o join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values ttlav on ttlav.taxa_taxon_list_id=o.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id and ttlav.deleted=false and ttlav.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id in (#adult_attr_id#) -- and larval? join cache_termlists_terms tguild on tguild.id=ttlav.int_value where sample_id=#sample_id#

param.name: sample_id
param.description: Sample id to retrieve data for.

param.name: adult_attr_id
param.description: Occurrance attribute that holds adult guild.

param.name: larval_attr_id
param.description: Occurrance attribute that holds larval guild.
